memberdef.name: discord_join_vc

briefdescription.para: Send a Voice State Update to Discord.

detaileddescription.para:
Necessary to connect to the voice server. When succesful a new voice connection instance will start
client
the client created with discord_init()
guild_id
the guild that houses the voice channel
channel_id
the voice channel the client wants to connect to
self_mute
#true will join as mute
self_deaf
#true will join as deaf
a enum value of how the connection went

memberdef.argsstring: (struct discord_voice *vc, enum discord_voice_speaking_flags flag, int delay)

briefdescription.para: Gracefully exits a ongoing Discord Voice connection.
